page.title: 06Organisations
page.content: There are several organisations to cater for various interests in the village. The church has its choir and bell ringers. A group of ladies meets each Wednesday to do tapestries for kneelers in the church. Another womens group meets on the first Wedneday each month for a varied programme of activities. There is also the Elm Club for older members of the community. The youth is catered for at the weekly meeting of the Youth Club in the village hall, and those who enjoy drama may join the Theatre Club. Gardeners have the meetins of the Horticultural Society to look forward to and the keen footballers can become members of Ewelme Football Team which plays in an amateur league on Sundays.
